reviews.review_msg: Two courses with Paul before he retired. Best: Paul picks good reads for the course! You go to Paul's course not thinking about the grade. You go to it because you know that English studies are about interdisciplinary and critical disposition and tons of reading. Honours effort, ideas and passion for the text!

Brilliant. Quiet, thoughtful, gracious, generous -in short, an outstanding human being. I hope that someday I can repay him somehow. Many of the reviews here will describe him as quirky. He is, but that misses the point. Pay attention to how carefully & artfully constructed his lectures are. He cares more about lit and life than others: revere him.
